xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/50533-Burning Water 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Burning Water looks at the financial and social impact on one family whose proto-typically Albertan dream of living off the land puts it at odds with the ideals of a "New West" where the land is dominated by oll and gas wells rather than herds of cattle, and the provincial government seems to favour energy royalties over the farmers. Burning Water
